passives.name: Baleful Blaze
passives.effects: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take 10 (+1% AP) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 3 seconds, for a total of 60 magic damage (+6% AP). Against monsters, the burn deals 10 bonus magic damage per tick, dealing a total of 20 (+1% AP) magic damage per tick for up to 120 magic damage (+6% AP).

passives.name: Blackfire
passives.effects: For each champion, epic monster, and large monster afflicted with Baleful Blaze's burn, increase your ability power by 4%.
